text: The Grass Harp is a 1995 American comedy-drama movie directed by Charles Matthau and was based on the 1951 novel of the same name by Truman Capote. It stars Piper Laurie, Sissy Spacek, Walter Matthau, Jack Lemmon, Edward Furlong, Nell Carter, Roddy McDowall, Mary Steenburgen, Charles Durning, Doris Roberts, Scott Wilson and was distributed by Fine Line Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1995 comedy-drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies set in Alabama Category:Movies set in the 1940s
title: The Grass Harp (movie)
